Straight Shot embraces Elita.

" We promise, as soon as we know who did tha=
t and how, we will bring your dad back to you.  But now you have to be real=
ly strong because whoever is out there doing all these bad things probably =
feeds off our weaknesses."

Nightshift turns to his femme bot friends.  

"=
 Hey it's okay kiddo, we can do this, you'll have your dad back the way he =
was.  It's just gonna take a little while.   And when he snaps out of it I'=
m drag'n his tailpipes back ta the Ark for some serious antivirus software =
uploading.  Good thing Tucson, Straight Shot and I , asked Ratchet ta insta=
ll those anti hack programs inta our processors when he was still around."
=

He rubs Elita's head gently with a tender smile.

" Don't you worry about =
anything, the bad guy's gonna go down for what they did, and big time."

Pe=
rpetually on the move and constantly busy.

<html><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Straight Shot embraces Elita.</div><di=
v><br></div><div>" We promise, as soon as we know who did that and how, we =
will bring your dad back to you.  But now you have to be really strong=
 because whoever is out there doing all these bad things probably feeds off=
 our weaknesses."</div><div><br></div><div>Nightshift turns to his femme bo=
t friends.  </div><div><br></div><div>" Hey it's okay kiddo, we can do=
 this, you'll have your dad back the way he was.  It's just gonna take=
 a little while.   And when he snaps out of it I'm drag'n his tailpipe=
s back ta the Ark for some serious antivirus software uploading.  Good=
 thing Tucson, Straight Shot and I , asked Ratchet ta install those anti ha=
ck programs inta our processors when he was still around."</div><div><br></=
div><div>He rubs Elita's head gently with a tender smile.</div><div><br></d=
iv><div>" Don't you worry about anything, the bad guy's gonna go down for w=
hat they did, and big time."<br><br>Perpetually on the move and constantly =
busy. </div><div><br>On Aug 15, 2011, at 9:50 AM, Airshadow Nightstar =
